artifacts.summary: Detailed analysis of architectural blocker preventing sorry removal from truth_at_implies_semantic_truth
Added helper lemmas and documentation explaining the truth lemma gap

partial_progress.details: Phases 1-4 blocked by fundamental architectural issue: truth_at_implies_semantic_truth cannot be proven for arbitrary SemanticWorldStates. Local consistency (IsLocallyConsistent) is weaker than MCS properties needed for truth correspondence. Phase 5 partial - added documentation but sorry remains.

metadata.blocker_summary: IsLocallyConsistent is weaker than MCS properties; forward direction of truth lemma fails for non-MCS-derived world states

completion_data.completion_summary: Analyzed truth_at_implies_semantic_truth but discovered fundamental architectural gap: LocallyConsistent assignments don't guarantee correspondence between recursive truth (truth_at) and assignment truth (semantic_truth_at_v2). Added documentation and helper lemmas. Sorry remains; requires architectural redesign to fix.
